caption:
April brought adventure, celebration and connection! 💫

In Sweden, we conquered the walls with an indoor climbing session 🧗, while Norway celebrated with a festive egg hunt 🐣. In Latvia, we took our Greater Than logo to new heights—climbing over 5,000m in Nepal 🏔️ and 80+ students joined our Job Shadow Day to explore life at Accenture 💼.
Meanwhile in France, we stirred things up with a cooking class 🍳. We also celebrated Consulting Day 🎯 and hosted a global training event that united 10K colleagues across 100+ cities 🌍. Spain celebrated their 60th anniversary 🎉  and the UK gave us a behind-the-scenes look at their Byte Sized podcast 🎙️.

Here’s to a vibrant May ahead! 🌷
 
[Image Description:
Image 1: A group enjoys a bouldering session at an indoor climbing gym.
Image 2: Four smiling colleagues stand around a counter in an Accenture office, holding colorful eggs. 
Image 3: A smiling woman in hiking gear stands on a mountain next to a sign. She’s surrounded by colorful flags and snowy mountains under a clear blue sky.
Image 4: A photo of a group of young adults working at computers in an office. Two women and two men are visible. One woman is in the foreground, and a young man is sitting next to her. They are wearing lanyards around their necks.
Image 5: A group of people are cooking in a professional kitchen. Vegetables are laid out on a counter, and people are preparing food at various stations.
Image 6: The photo shows four women standing in a row in front of a large, vertical Accenture banner. The banner is predominantly purple and pink ombre with the Accenture logo in white.
Image 7: The photo shows a woman with shoulder-length brown hair, wearing a vibrant red blazer, blowing out the candles on a cake. The cake has purple frosting and the numbers “60” are prominently displayed in gold on top.
Image 8: Two people sit in chairs facing each other, engaged in conversation. A small table sits between them. The background features a purple display screen. Microphones are visible near each person.]
